instructions_to_main_agent: Use .jsx extension for all React components.
Implement the 'Modern Academic' theme: Clean, high-contrast, with serif headings.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1/H2 headings to give it that university prestige.
Use 'Manrope' for all body text and UI elements for maximum legibility.
For the Dashboard, use a 'Control Room' grid layout. Dense but breathable.
Implement a 'Tracing Beam' effect on document cards using framer-motion if possible, or simple border color transitions.
Use Shadcn components for all interactive elements (Dialogs, Dropdowns, Forms).
Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Modern Academic' theme (e.g., sharper corners on cards, serif fonts in headers).
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Do not use generic gradients. Use subtle noise textures or solid colors.
For the 'My Documents' view, provide both a Grid view (Cards) and a List view (Table).
The 'Activity Logs' should be a dense table with clear status indicators (colored badges).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
